Class SecondPageView

java.lang.Object
SecondPageView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISecondPageView
public class SecondPageView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISecondPageView
Class SecondPageView is in charge of all operations on second page including layout, buttons, listeners and functions
